parameter.name: Description
parameter.defaultValue: The closeness centrality of a vertex measures how easily other vertices can be reached from it (or the other way: how easily it can be reached from the other vertices).

parameter.name: Diagonals
parameter.defaultValue: Boolean indicating whether or not the diagonal should be treated as valid data.

parameter.name: Maximum Deviation
parameter.defaultValue: Whether or not the theoretical maximum absolute deviation from the maximum nodal centrality should be returned

parameter.name: Rescale to 1
parameter.defaultValue: If true, centrality scores are rescaled such that they sum to 1.

parameter.name: Weighted Edges
parameter.defaultValue: Consider the edge weights in determining the shortest paths.

parameter.name: Ignore Breaks
parameter.defaultValue: Unreachable nodes are ignored for disconnected graphs.
